column4: using partimage a created an image of a 15G partition and restored it to a 80G partition. Now the 80GB is showing 7G used and 8G free, how can I fix this?
it's NTFS, does it matter, use fsck anyway? Tried chkdsk, didn't help
if its ntfs use windows tools if you can... maybe if yo resize the partion via gparted ?
